settings.html:
<style>
.dynamic-faq {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: start ;
    align-items: start ;
    }
    
    .jet-listing-dynamic-repeater__item {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #f2f2f2;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .faq-item {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: start !important;
    align-items: start !important;
    gap: .3rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #f2f2f2;
    width: 100%;
    }
    
    .faq-question {
        font-family: var(--e-global-typography-0da9deb-font-family), Sans-serif;
    font-size: var(--e-global-typography-0da9deb-font-size);
    font-weight: var(--e-global-typography-0da9deb-font-weight);
    line-height: var(--e-global-typography-0da9deb-line-height);
    letter-spacing: var(--e-global-typography-0da9deb-letter-spacing);
    word-spacing: var(--e-global-typography-0da9deb-word-spacing);
    padding: 1rem 0;
    width: 100%;
    }
    
    .faq-answer {
    display: none;
    max-height: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
    }

    .faq-answer.open {
        display: block;
        max-height: 500px;
    }
</style>

<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    const faqItems = document.querySelectorAll('.faq-item');

    faqItems.forEach(item => {
        const question = item.querySelector('.faq-question');
        const answer = item.querySelector('.faq-answer');

        question.addEventListener('click', function () {
            
            const isOpen = answer.classList.contains('open');
            answer.classList.toggle('open', !isOpen);

            
            faqItems.forEach(otherItem => {
                const otherAnswer = otherItem.querySelector('.faq-answer');
                if (otherAnswer !== answer) {
                    otherAnswer.classList.remove('open');
                }
            });
        });
    });
});

</script>
